title: Navratri 2015 Day 8: Worship Maa Mahagauri, Goddess of wisdom and power
text:
Navratri 2015 Day 8: Worship Maa Mahagauri, Goddess of wisdom and power By Zainab Mulla on October 20, 2015 at 12:01 AM Comments 
Goddess Mahagauri eighth manifestation of Maa Durga who is worshipped on this day. It is said that she forgives sins and fulfills all the desires of her devotees. According to ancient myths, she performed rigid Tapas without moving her body, due to which heavy amount of soil and dust got collected on her body. Lord Shiva cleaned her with pure water and therefore, purity is depicted in this form of Durga. (Read: Durga Puja 2015 in Hindi: Best Durga Puja SMS, Shayari, WhatsApp Messages to wish Happy Durga Puja greetings!) 
The goddess is dressed in Peacock Green color on Durga Ashtami. On this day, Saraswati Mata Puja is conducted whole-heartedly and Pink is regarded as the colour of the day for all the devotees. Maa Mahagauri is usually depicted in a white saree and rides a bull. She has four arms and holds a trident and tambourine in it. (Read: Navratri 2015 Colours: Know the 9 different dress colours to wear on each day during this Navratri!) 
Worship Goddess on this day to improve your knowledge skills and also remove sorrow from your life. We hope with her blessings devotees walk on the path of virtue and inner power. 
Chant this holy mantra to worship Maa Mahagauri 
श्वेते वृषे समारूढा श्वेताम्बरधरा शुचिः | 
महागौरी शुभं दद्यान्त्र महादेव प्रमोददा || 
Śvētē vr̥ṣē samārūḍhā śvētāmbaradharā śuciḥ | 
mahāgaurī śubhaṁ dadyāntra mahādēva pramōdadā || 
या देवी सर्वभू‍तेषु माँ महागौरी रूपेण संस्थिता। नमस्तस्यै नमस्तस्यै नमस्तस्यै नमो नम:।। 
Shwete Vrishe Maha Rudha Shwetambardhara Shuchih | 
Maha Gauri Subham Dadhyanmahadev Pramodada ||
